TopicTitle: My attempt to make a Mad Max War Rig in KSP

Articles.Content:
Just saw the latest movie for the second time today, came home so excited I wanted to go right out to my shop and get to work on my dune buggy but it was dark and cold so instead I stayed inside and built a version of the soon to be icon "war rig" from Fury Road.

The hardest part was getting the three sections joined together with claws without the game crashing but I finally did it.

![Screen%20Shot%202015-05-18%20at%2012.34.57%20AM_zpsvlhbyrne.png](http://i1232.photobucket.com/albums/ff366/Aerindel_Prime/Screen%20Shot%202015-05-18%20at%2012.34.57%20AM_zpsvlhbyrne.png)
Can't see the pictures right now, but I'll check back later. How good is it at ramming through buildings? Does it explode nicely?

Watched it last night on [REDACTED] and its a 10/10. Super nice graphics and fighting scenes are really really good.

Can't Wait to play this game!!
